column1: The Greater Gelion was one of the two rivers that flowed together to form the source of long Gelion
column2: that flowed along the eastern borders of Beleriand. The Greater Gelion rose beneath Mount Rerir in the northern Blue Mountains
column3: and flowed southwestwards to meet the Little Gelion. It formed the eastern boundary of the lands controlled by Maglor during most of the First Age.
